alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 10:28PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with higher amounts towards the north slope of the Uintas. Occasional blowing snow is possible with winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. In Utah, Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected, especially tonight through Wednesday morning. This includes I-80 in southwest Wyoming.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley
